name: ARGE
description:
ARGE or Absolutely Realistic Gladiator Experience is a first person fight game made for Winnovation 2019 Summer Edition. Made with Unity3D

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Mouse left click for attacking
  • Mouse right click for defending
  • Dragging the mouse while holding the left button and then releasing decides the direction of the attack

Tools used:

  • Unity3D
  • Blender
  • Visual Studio
